recipes.title: Jalapeno Popper Grilled Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: 2 jalapeno peppers, cut in half lengthwise and seeded
1/2 cup jack and cheddar cheese, shredded
instructions: put the chicken on the grill and grill each side for 5 minutes
take the chicken out in the palate, and squeeze lime juice on top of it
cover the chicken in the alluminum foil and leave for 5 minutes befroe serving
